attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: speed bumps cause more fuel to be use causing more green house gasses beacuse of lower gears are needed, i understand why there areound school, hospitals etc but why are they everywhere?

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/speed-bumps/

If you decide to resubmit you also need to make the title of the petition a call to action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
